title: Playing it Close to the Vest
author: verias
text:
Seems like both sides are conspiring a little bit here. Aren't they?

Of course, leaving Theresa to keep an eye on Mister Eerie should help keep things in line, we hope!

On a separate note, I've started a Patreon for my non-MotA related work things! Commissions, random draws, brain dumps and tutorials! Swing by and check it out here.

Keith W.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: I have simple solution to this. Theresa put's a bullet between the painted eyes of the two pin-heads while Chrys arranged shipments of enough food for the two clans to survive the winter.

replies.author: Musical_life*Guest*
replies.text: That works! In other news, I have a package coming today with supplies for my new tablet. I can't wait to start using this thing!
